name: Tether (itch) (Nadav Hekselman)
description:
Welcome cadet! Your first rescuing mission will take place in the Maldoras orbital junk yard. We discovered a distress signal next to the debris of the destroyed station. 

Use your thrusters or jump of debris and surfaces to get to your target. Use you tether and attach to the different debris so you can take time and evaluate  the next destination in your route or collect more fuel and oxygen.

Good luck with the retrieval! 

Controls

Look - Mouse / Gamepad right stick
Thrusters - WASD / Gamepad left stick
Attach Tether - Left Mouse Button / Gamepad A Button
Release Tether - Right Mouse Button / Gamepad B Button
Reel In Tether - TAB / Gamepad Y Button
Jump - Spacebar / Gamepad A Button
Roll - Q,E / Gamepad Left,Right Shouler
Reset - T / Special left
